TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

summary.span: 表示 控件的样式和一些 Web 部件。

span.span: Represents the style for the control and some Web Parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示表控件的样式。The class is used to represent the style for a table control. 它封装属性，这些属性控制表的外观，并且可以应用于多个表控件以提供常见的外观。It encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a table and can be applied to multiple table controls to provide a common appearance. 您可以通过设置属性来指定在表的背景中显示的图像 。You can specify an image to display in the background of the table by setting the property. 表的单元格之间的间距量由 属性控制。The amount of spacing between the cells of a table is controlled by the property. 单元格的内容和单元格边框之间的间距是使用属性指定的 。The spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border is specified using the property. 您可以通过设置属性来指定是否显示单元格边框 。You can specify whether cell borders are displayed by setting the property. 相对于 Web 窗体页上的其他元素，表的水平对齐方式由 属性指示。The horizontal alignment of the table in relation to other elements on the Web Forms page is indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此类主要由控件开发人员使用。This class is primarily used by control developers. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象，然后使用 方法将其应用于生成的 对象。The following example creates a object and then uses the method to apply it to a generated object.

summary.span: 将有关背景图像、单元格间距、单元格填充、网格线和对齐方式的信息添加到要呈现的特性列表中。

span.span: Adds information about the background image, cell spacing, cell padding, gridlines, and alignment to the list of attributes to render.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the background of a table control.

value.span: 要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image to display in the background of a table control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the background of the table control. > [!NOTE] > 如果图像小于表，则将平铺图像。The image will be tiled if it is smaller than the table. 同样，如果图像大于该表，则会裁剪该图像。Similarly, the image is cropped if it is larger than the table. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 背景图像的 URL 被设置为 。

span.span: The URL of the background image was set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellPadding { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格内容与单元格边框之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 数据列表控件的同一列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元宽度。All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width. 因此，如果一个单元格的内容长于同一列中其他单元格的内容，则填充量将应用于最宽的单元格。Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell. 列中的所有其他单元还将设置为此单元格宽度。All other cells in the column are also set with this cell width. 同样，同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height. 填充量适用于行中最高单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row. 同一行中的所有其他单元格都用此单元格高度设置。All other cells in the same row are set with this cell height. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的距离设置为小于 的值。

span.span: The specified distance is set to a value less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表单元格之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between table cells.

value.span: 表单元格之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between table cells.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制数据列表控件中相邻单元格之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control. 此间距同时应用于垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 单元格间距对于整个数据列表控件是统一的。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data list control. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为大于的值 `0` ，并将 属性设置为显示单元格边框的值，则相邻单元格的边框之间将显示一个间隙。If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在这种情况下， 属性控制间隔大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的距离设置为小于 的值。

span.span: The specified distance is set to a value less than .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否显示表控件的单元格之间的边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of the table control is displayed.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。Use the property to specify whether the border between the cells of the data list control is displayed. 此属性设置为一个 枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||不显示单元格边框。No cell border is displayed.| ||仅显示数据列表控件中单元格的上边框和下边框。Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| ||仅显示数据列表控件中单元格的左边框和右边框。Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| ||显示数据列表控件中的所有单元格边框。All borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign
Public Overridable Property HorizontalAlign As HorizontalAlign

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign value); };
member this.HorizontalAlign : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表在其容器内的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the table within its container.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定数据列表控件在其容器内的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data list control within its container. 此属性设置为一个 枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| ||表在其容器中左对齐。The table is left justified within its container.| ||表在其容器中居中。The table is centered within its container.| ||表在其容器中右对齐。The table is right justified within its container.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的水平对齐方式不是 枚举值中的一个。

span.span: The specified horizontal alignment is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 清除样式的任何定义的样式元素。

span.span: Clears any defined style elements of the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除所有定义的样式元素，并使该样式保持为默认状态。Clears any defined style elements, and leaves the style in the default state.
